TopOption.Text: Have you seen Sid?

BottomOption.Text: You are adorable! What do you like to do?

AccidentStatement.Text: I visited Sid at the nurse. He was still unconscious, so I let him borrow chubby bunny! I thought it would make him feel better, because my chubby bunny always make me feel better!
When I came back to get chubby bunny, I heard him groan the words “Martin” and “Merge Sort”. What do you think that means?

TopOption.Text: I heard something happened at Ping-Pong yesterday.

BottomOption.Text: I want to know more about you!

AccidentStatement.Text: I don’t play ping-pong, but I know Sid really loves it. I hope he gets better soon from his injury.

TopOption.Text: Do you know anything about who hurt Sid?

BottomOption.Text: Tell me something about you that I don't know.

AccidentStatement.Text: What kind of baka gets hit over the head with a ping pong paddle? Due to my superior knowledge I was able to find the ping-pong paddle used for the attack. Two letters were written on it.
Obviously the paddle didn’t belong to someone who draws, because I couldn’t make out the first letter... The second letter was H.

StartingStatement.Text: Pardon my French, but your smile is most beautiful.

TopOption.Text: What happened yesterday to Sid?

BottomOption.Text: Tell me about yourself!

AccidentStatement.Text: Sid and I were playing a sweaty game of ping pong, shirts versus skins. I was skins. I went to get a drink and when I came back he was unconscious!
Thankfully Louis was just outside the room. With Louis help, and my perfect French body, we were able to carry Sid to the nurse

TopOption.Text: Where is Sid?

BottomOption.Text: Okay...I want to know more about you.

AccidentStatement.Text: Sid is gone... knocked unconscious by a ping-pong paddle.
I’m not sure who did it... but it has to be someone who plays Ping-Pong.

TopOption.Text: Do you know anything about what happened to Sid?

BottomOption.Text: Do me the honor of telling me more about yourself!

AccidentStatement.Text: Charley came and found me at my desk and we were luckily able to get an unconscious Sid to the nurse.
Although, I’m not sure why Charley was sweaty and didn’t have a shirt on.

TopOption.Text: Why isn’t Jerrick here?

BottomOption.Text: I would love to know more about you.

AccidentStatement.Text: Jerrick’s favorite stuffed animal was beheaded...I feel bad... Jerrick was so upset.
I found some of his chubby bunny’s stuffing over by the programmers' desks.

TopOption.Text: Another accident happened?

BottomOption.Text: Just tell me something about yourself.

AccidentStatement.Text: I don’t care what they say, I didn't hurt Jerrick's chubby bunny.
Do I think it's dumb he brings his stuffed animal to school? Yes. Would I hurt it? Of course not! I have a child of my own, I know how much they care about their stuffed animals.

StartingStatement.Text: Pardon my French, but your smile is most beautiful.

TopOption.Text: I heard someone hurt Jerrick's chubby bunny?

BottomOption.Text: French culture intrigues me, I want to know more about you.

AccidentStatement.Text: Oh you mean Jerrick's stuffed animal. Someone was cruel and cut off it's head.
Reminds me of France and King Louis the XVI.

TopOption.Text: Any hints about who hurt Jerrick's chubby bunny?

BottomOption.Text: Please tell me more about yourself.

AccidentStatement.Text: I’m not a young man anymore...

TopOption.Text: Why isn't Jerrick in school?

BottomOption.Text: I would love to know more about you.

AccidentStatement.Text: What a shame about Jerrick. He was a faithful subject.
When he found his chubby bunny headless, he was too emotionally scarred to come into school.
Too bad about his stuffed animal. Looked like the work of a guillotine.

TopOption.Text: Who do you think put those objects in Louis’s locker?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: The objects that fell on Alex were art supplies, so it only makes sense that Yunhao was the one that did it.

StartingStatement.Text: Pardon my French, but your smile is most beautiful.

TopOption.Text: What happened to Alex yesterday?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: It really is a tragedy what happened to Alex. All those art supplies falling from Louis locker onto him.
I wish I could cry as readily as Louis, ladies totally dig the sensitive type.

TopOption.Text: So another accident happened, this time to Alex?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: It’s unfortunate what happened to Alex. Adnan thinks it was me…
My art tools went missing a few days ago… just after I finished my drawing of Louis.

TopOption.Text: How did Alex get hurt from things falling out of your locker?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: Poor Alex, he was an honorable subject. I asked him to acquire something from my locker for me, but someone filled my locker with art supplies!
The supplies fell onto Alex cracking one of his ribs. I fear someone has it out for me. That trap was obviously meant for me!

StartingStatement.Text: Pardon my French, but your smile is most beautiful.

TopOption.Text: Do you know anything about Adnan getting hurt?

BottomOption.Text: I want to get to know you more.

AccidentStatement.Text: Adnan was listening to rock music when he was electrocuted, how unromantic.
Kind of strange though, Adnan never listens to rock, but Louis loves Rock music.

TopOption.Text: What happened to Adnan?

BottomOption.Text: I want to get to know you more.

AccidentStatement.Text: He was electrocuted. Maybe Louis know something... he was near Adnan’s desk just before it all happened.

TopOption.Text: How was Adnan injured?

BottomOption.Text: I want to get to know you more.

AccidentStatement.Text: He was electrocuted by computer wires. Looks like the wires were intentionally clipped.
Only someone who has extensive audio knowledge would know how to clip those wires just right.

TopOption.Text: How did Charley break his arm?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: He was playing Ping-Pong with Louis beforehand he slipped in the locker room and broke his arm.
Why does everyone keep getting injured…should I be worried?

TopOption.Text: Was Charley pushed while showering?

BottomOption.Text: How are you doing?

AccidentStatement.Text: How unhygienic to be showering in a public locker room. There was soap all over the floor, its completely possible he slipped on his own.
